title.value: EurNet: Efficient Multi-Range Relational Modeling of Protein Structure
title.justification: Title is prominently mentioned at the beginning of the paper
title.quote: EurNet: Efficient Multi-Range Relational Modeling of Protein Structure

extractions.description: This paper introduces EurNet, a novel protein structure encoder designed for efficient multi-range relational modeling of protein structures. EurNet represents the protein structure as a multi-relational residue-level graph with three types of edges capturing short-range, medium-range, and long-range interactions. The core building block of EurNet is the Gated Relational Message Passing (GRMP) layer, which is both efficient and effective for this purpose. The study shows state-of-the-art performance of EurNet on Enzyme Commission (EC) and Gene Ontology (GO) protein function prediction benchmarks, demonstrating superior performance-efficiency trade-off compared to existing methods.

type.justification: The paper includes empirical results from evaluating EurNet on protein function prediction benchmarks and compares its performance with existing models
type.quote: We verify the state-of-the-art performance of EurNet on EC and GO protein function prediction benchmarks...

name.justification: The paper focuses on protein structure modeling, which is a central topic in computational biology
name.quote: Modeling the 3D structures of proteins is critical for obtaining effective protein structure representations.

name.justification: The paper introduces a new type of graph neural network model designed for protein structure modeling
name.quote: we propose a novel modeling layer, called Gated Relational Message Passing (GRMP), as the basic building block of EurNet

name.justification: The model is evaluated on protein function prediction benchmarks, making it an essential sub-field
name.quote: We study the effectiveness and efficiency of EurNet on EC and GO protein function prediction benchmarks

name.justification: EurNet is the primary model proposed in the paper
name.quote: To attain this goal, we propose a novel protein structure encoder called EurNet for Efficient multi-range relational modeling

is_contributed.justification: The paper contributes EurNet as a new model
is_contributed.quote: we propose a novel protein structure encoder called EurNet

is_executed.justification: The model performance evaluation requires substantial computational resources typical of GPU execution
is_executed.quote: All models are trained with batch size 16 on 4 Tesla-V100-32GB GPUs

is_compared.justification: EurNet's performance is compared to existing models like GearNet in various benchmarks
is_compared.quote: Under the fair comparison with comparable model size, EurNet consistently outperforms the previous SOTA GearNet

referenced_paper_title.justification: EurNet is the novel model introduced in this paper, not referenced from another paper

name.justification: GearNet is an existing SOTA model used for comparison in the paper
name.quote: GearNet (Zhang et al., 2022) relates to our work by exploring multi-relational modeling of residue-level structures with short-range linking and relational graph convolution (RGConv)

is_contributed.justification: GearNet is used for comparison and not introduced by this paper
is_contributed.quote: GearNet (Zhang et al., 2022) relates to our work by exploring multi-relational modeling of residue-level structures with short-range linking and relational graph convolution (RGConv)

is_executed.justification: GearNet's performance is benchmarked in the study, indicating execution
is_executed.quote: We study the effectiveness and efficiency of EurNet on EC and GO protein function prediction benchmarks. Under the fair comparison with comparable model size, EurNet consistently outperforms the previous SOTA GearNet

is_compared.justification: GearNet is the baseline for performance comparison with EurNet
is_compared.quote: Under the fair comparison with comparable model size, EurNet consistently outperforms the previous SOTA GearNet
